price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߘߐ߬ߛߘߊ߬ߞߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߝߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߘߐ߬ߛߘߊ߬ߞߊ߲ ߕߌߢߍ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلۡمِيثَٰقَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yūfūna biʿahdi al-lahi walā yanquḍūna al-mīthāqa
